name: Dead Or Alive (itch)
description:
Game made by FirefoxyLeGibus(me), #Guigui and Louvtt for the Ben Bonk Game Jam 3
Controls :
Arrow keys - Move
Space - Jump

We didn't have the time to make something perfect but . . . we tried
It was quite fun
This game is super short and easy, we didn't have enough time to do better
it's our first game jam btw
